text: Hello...  Hello...  Whoever answered the phone... Can you please turn up the volume, so the rest of your team can hear me?   Franco wanted me to call and give you some advice on how to respond to a customer wanting discounts... This is what you tell them...   I don't have any discounts, but what I do have are a very particular set of epid sales skills. Skills I have acquired over a very long career of wine dropping and doing demos. Skills that make me a nightmare for my competitors. If you agree to go forward with Vonage now that'll be the end of it. I will not pursue you, but if you don't, I will look for you, I will take you to top golf, pay for your dinner and drinks and above all else...  I will freaking close you...  Oh and by the way Team 5280...  Good Morning!!  In case you couldn't guesss...  You are listening to a text-to-speech Call made with the Nexmo Voice API
